body:
From slack:

```
Right now Im doing
cadence workflow reset \
  -w "$workflow_id" \
  -r "$(cadence wf descid "$workflow_id" | jq '.WorkflowExecutionInfo.Execution.runId' -r)" \
  --reason retry \
  --reset_type LastDecisionCompleted
but Im not sure if that automatic extraction of runid wont cause some surprising behaviour
```
title: Consider making runId optional for reset
